text: Bose Corporation is a company that makes speakers and audio products. It is based in Framingham, Massachusetts in the United States. Bose Corporation was founded by Amar Bose, a sound engineer. == Gallery == File:Bose WaveRadio.jpg|Bose WaveRadio File:Bose TriPort.jpg|Bose headphones File:Bose MediaMate computer speakers.jpg|Bose computer speakers File:BoseInEarMarkKim.JPG|Bose earphones File:BOSE QuietComfort.JPG|Bose Quiet Comfort ==Other websites== Category:American technology companies Category:Companies based in Massachusetts Category:1964 establishments in the United States
title: Bose Corporation
